label: Site Search
query: site:{input}

label: Subdomains
query: site:*.{input}

label: Login Pages
query: site:{input} (inurl:login OR inurl:signin OR inurl:signup OR inurl:register OR inurl:auth)

label: SQL Errors
query: site:{input} (intext:"sql syntax near" OR intext:"syntax error" OR intext:"mysql_" OR intext:"Warning: mysql")

label: Documents
query: site:{input} (ext:doc OR ext:docx OR ext:pdf OR ext:xls OR ext:xlsx OR ext:txt)

label: API Keys Exposed
query: site:{input} (intext:"api_key" OR intext:"apiToken" OR intext:"access_token" OR intext:"secret_key")

label: Config Files
query: site:{input} (inurl:config OR inurl:configuration OR inurl:settings) (ext:xml OR ext:json OR ext:yaml OR ext:ini)

label: Directory Listings
query: site:{input} (intitle:"index of /" OR intitle:"index of")

label: Backup Files
query: site:{input} (inurl:backup OR inurl:bak OR inurl:old) (ext:zip OR ext:rar OR ext:tar OR ext:gz OR ext:bak)

label: Git Repositories
query: site:{input} (inurl:.git OR inurl:.svn OR inurl:gitlab OR inurl:github)

label: Error Messages
query: site:{input} (intext:"error" OR intext:"warning" OR intext:"exception" OR intext:"fatal error")

label: Database Admin
query: site:{input} (inurl:phpmyadmin OR inurl:adminer OR inurl:dbadmin OR inurl:database)

label: Cloud Storage
query: site:{input} (inurl:s3.amazonaws.com OR inurl:storage.googleapis.com OR inurl:azure OR intext:"bucket")

label: Upload Forms
query: site:{input} (inurl:upload OR inurl:filemanager OR inurl:uploads)

label: Old/Deprecated
query: site:{input} (inurl:old OR inurl:deprecated OR inurl:v1 OR inurl:legacy OR inurl:archive)

label: Code Comments
query: site:{input} (inurl:js OR ext:js) (intext:"TODO" OR intext:"FIXME" OR intext:"password" OR intext:"token")
description: Find TODO and secrets in JS

label: Checkout/Payment
query: site:{input} (inurl:checkout OR inurl:payment OR inurl:cart OR inurl:order)

label: Confidential Docs
query: site:{input} (intext:"confidential" OR intext:"internal use only" OR intext:"do not share")

label: Password Reset
query: site:{input} (inurl:reset OR inurl:forgotpassword OR inurl:recover OR inurl:passwordreset)

label: Debug/Dev Tools
query: site:{input} (inurl:devtools OR inurl:debug OR inurl:console OR inurl:monitoring)

label: Test/Sample Data
query: site:{input} (intext:"dummy data" OR intext:"sample data" OR intext:"test data" OR intext:"lorem ipsum")

label: CMS Versions
query: site:{input} (intext:"powered by WordPress" OR intext:"powered by Joomla" OR intext:"powered by Drupal")

label: Shell Upload
query: site:{input} (inurl:shell OR inurl:cmd OR inurl:root OR inurl:upload) (ext:php OR ext:asp)

label: Path Traversal
query: site:{input} (inurl:../ OR inurl:%2e%2e%2f OR inurl:/../../)

label: Robots & Sitemaps
query: site:{input} (inurl:robots.txt OR inurl:sitemap.xml)

label: Contact Info
query: site:{input} (intext:"contact us" OR intext:"support" OR intext:"@{input}")

label: Email Addresses
query: site:{input} intext:@{input}
